eng: of; -'s; _marks modifier or associate_ {COMPLEMENT:kind; relation; specifier {GENITIVE:genitive}|RELATIVE:whose}
than; as; _marks amount or degree_ {COMPLEMENT:amount; number; quantity; extent; magnitude {GENITIVE:numerical; quantitative; equative}|RELATIVE:the amount that}
by; _marks agent_ {COMPLEMENT:subject; agent; cause; force {GENITIVE:causal; subjective}|RELATIVE:who}
on; to; _marks direct object, patient, or experiencer_ {COMPLEMENT:direct object {GENITIVE:objective; absolutive; accusative}|RELATIVE:which; of which}
to; by; _marks indirect object, theme, stimulus, or recipient_ {COMPLEMENT:indirect object {GENITIVE:objective}|RELATIVE:whom}

at; on; in; _marks time_ {COMPLEMENT:time; date; instance {GENITIVE:temporal; dative}|RELATIVE:when|INTERROGATIVE:when|INDETERMINATE:one day; sometime; at some point|DETERMINATE:then|PROXIMAL:now|VERB:be at; coincide; OBJ happens at the same time as IND}

on; at; in; _marks location_ {COMPLEMENT:location; place {GENITIVE:spacial; locative}|RELATIVE:where|INTERROGATIVE:where|INDETERMINATE:somewhere|DETERMINATE:there|PROXIMAL:here|VERB:be present; be; OBJ is present at IND}

by; with; through; _marks instrument_ {COMPLEMENT:tool; medium; instrument {GENITIVE:instrumental; prolative}|RELATIVE:with which|INTERROGATIVE:with what; how|INDETERMINATE:with something; somehow|DETERMINATE:with that; thus|PROXIMAL:with this; like so|VERB:use; work through; SBJ {user} uses OBJ}

because; since; _marks cause_ {COMPLEMENT:cause; inciting event; agent {GENITIVE:causal}|RELATIVE:why; because of which|INTERROGATIVE:why; wherefore|INDETERMINATE:for some reason|DETERMINATE:therefore; for that reason|PROXIMAL:herefore; because of this}

if; for; _marks hypothetical world_ {COMPLEMENT:condition; world {GENITIVE:conditional}|RELATIVE:for which|INTERROGATIVE:under what condition; when|INDETERMINATE:in some event|DETERMINATE:in that event|PROXIMAL:given this}

by; as; via; _marks method or manner_ {COMPLEMENT:method; way; path; manner {GENITIVE:methodical; formal; instructive}|RELATIVE:by which|INTERROGATIVE:how|INDETERMINATE:somehow|DETERMINATE:thus; thereby|PROXIMAL:like so; hereby}
